title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for the uses

One point is earned for the answer with reason

dB dt | B=40 = 1 5 ( 60 )=12 dB dt | B=70 = 1 5 ( 30 )=6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaadaWcaa qaaiaadsgacaWGcbaabaGaamizaiaadshaaaWaaqqaaeaadaWgaaWc baGaamOqaiabg2da9iaaisdacaaIWaaabeaaaOGaay5bSdGaeyypa0 ZaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGynaaaadaqadaqaaiaaiAdacaaIWaaa caGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGymaiaaikdaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWGcbaabaGaamizaiaadshaaaWaaqqaaeaadaWgaaWcbaGaamOq aiabg2da9iaaiEdacaaIWaaabeaaaOGaay5bSdGaeyypa0ZaaSaaae aacaaIXaaabaGaaGynaaaadaqadaqaaiaaiodacaaIWaaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaGaeyypa0JaaGOnaaaaaa@56C8@

Because dB dt | B=40  > dB dt | B=70 , the bird is gaining weight faster when it weighs 40 grams.
